about.1: I'm a dev and math enthusiast, focused on React, Node, .NET and Rust. Passionate about distributed systems. Currently, I work as a software engineer at Laika, where I build scalable microservices that handle complex data and workflows.
about.2: In this space, I plan to share some of my personal reflections and experiences as a developer. Hopefully you'll find something useful here.
about.3: I'm an advocate of open-source software and enjoy contributing to the community through various projects.
